name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
title: Sunken Dreams of Yore: Wine-Stained Tricorne
desc: "The wine-sodden sea hat was thrust by a storm into the sky, and then carried away on the roiling waves, while those fated to lose their homelands engaged in battles bereft of hope and want."
in_play_description: When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent Card: Spend 1 less Hydro Die. (Once per Round)

skills.desc:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Hydro Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
